name: QuadraDigger
description:
Get ready for an explosive new take on the classic falling-blocks genre! QuadraDigger is a frenetic game of speed and strategy with exciting new mechanics to tax your reflexes and improvisation.

Armed with sticky, nitroglycerine-infused blocks, you have a single goal: Blast your way to the center of the Earth! Adept placement will be rewarded with compound explosions and massive points, and bragging rights on the leaderboards.

Push your skills to the limit with sadistic difficulty levels and bonus game modes! Play cooperatively or against your friends in 2-to-4 local multiplayer!
